text: Branislav "Ciga" Jerinić (20 March 1932 – 27 June 2006) was a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than ninety films from 1958 to 2003. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Branislav Jerinić
